snippet: Financial technology firms in Brazil are grouping to discuss with local watchdogs how to regulate the fast-growing sector, in which the number of players has risen roughly six-fold over the past couple of years....

headline.main: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional

lead_paragraph: Financial technology firms in Brazil are grouping to discuss with local watchdogs how to regulate the fast-growing sector, in which the number of players has risen roughly six-fold over the past couple of years.
